Research Experience.name: Institute for Advanced Study, Princeton University
Research Experience.summary: Teaching at Palmer Physical Laboratory (now 302 Frist Campus Center). While not a professor at Princeton, I associated with the physics professors and continued to give lectures on campus.

volunteer.summary: The accumulated of the Shenzhen volunteer is more than 110h, and the service content includes assisting in various competitions, conferences, training, public welfare activities, etc

projects.name: Quantum Computing
projects.summary: Quantum computing is the use of quantum-mechanical phenomena such as superposition and entanglement to perform computation. Computers that perform quantum computations are known as quantum computers.
